description:
This course focuses on the extension of calculus to smooth functions of many
variables. A geometric approach leads to a treatment of regions in n-dimensional space, smooth functions and their derivatives, differential
forms, cycles, and integration. This course may be suitable for students
seeking advanced study in mathematics for physics or economics.
title: Advanced Calculus
prerequisite:
YSC2209 Proof (or permission of instructor)
YSC2232 Linear Algebra (acceptable as a coârequisite too.)
